appList.title: LINE WEBTOON - FREE Comics
appList.description:
LINE WEBTOON - A New Way To Enjoy Comics on Mobile 
  
LINE Webtoon service is a fun digital content service in which readers can view new content scheduled to be revealed every day of the week for free and conveniently enjoy webtoons on mobile devices. Download LINE Webtoon and get started right away! 
 
Main Features:

Scheduled publishing: Seven(7) to ten(10) webtoons are serially-updated every day of the week.
 
Mobile-optimized view (scroll-view mode):
- All webtoons are provided in a pageless format to fit better on mobile phones and tablets.
- You can scroll down at the speed as you want. You have total control over the speed of reading.

Language option: The content is offered in five(5) language options, English, Chinese (traditional, simplified), Thai and Indonesian.

Minimal data use: You can download webtoons to read them later offline (without an internet connection).
 
Push notification: Receive notifications of new releases or updates for your subscriptions.
Share & comment: Share your favorite webtoons via social media (Facebook, Twitter, LINE) and leave comments.
 
If any problems are found, please report them to our Customer Service ( http://me2.do/F7OPdSTJ ).
We might not be able to respond promptly to customer reviews.
appList.short_desc: Free comics are now available on your mobile devices!

appList.title: Marvel Comics
appList.description:
Introducing the MARVEL COMICS app on Android, featuring the world’s most popular super heroes! Download hundreds of comic books featuring your favorite characters -— including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America, Spider-Man, Wolverine and more -- on your mobile device or tablet with the touch of a button. You’ll experience Marvel’s greatest series and stories like never before, with your choice of guided view (an animated, panel-by-panel path through the comic), or by using regular device controls to zoom and pan your way through pages of sizzling story and amazing artwork! Each of your downloads will be protected and backed up when you use your Marvel.Com account, meaning the next time you lose or upgrade your device you’ll find your comics waiting to be read again!

Not convinced? Check out our free downloads! Take the Marvel Universe with you anytime & anywhere!

+ Access to over 13,500 comics featuring the world's most popular super heroes!
+ Free comics for download, updated weekly!
+ Customizable reading experience -- choose between panel to panel, full page display, and more!
appList.short_desc: MARVEL COMICS app on Android, featuring the world’s most popular super heroes!

appList.title: FreeShield: Unlimited Free VPN
appList.description:
FreeShield is the simplest way to keep you, your smartphone, and your personal information safe online. The app protects you from hackers attacking via malicious apps, websites, or unsecured wifi networks. With FreeShield you can:

- Use unprotected networks (including public wifi hotspots) without compromising your security
- Prevent your mobile carrier or ISP from monitoring your traffic
- Protect your passwords, credit card details, and private messages through an encrypted VPN
- Avoid the annoying and disruptive injection of extra advertising into your internet experience

Best of all, it’s completely free.

FreeShield works by directing all data traffic from you mobile device through a secure, encrypted VPN connection. This security layer prevents third parties from intercepting and reading your data. Note that FreeShield may analyze this information for product development purposes.

See how easily hackers can access your device when you use an unsecured wifi network in this article: http://www.foxnews.com/tech/2014/10/03/3-ways-crooks-attack-on-public-wi-fi/

Even your mobile carrier can interrupt your experience, such as some cell carrier's practice of injecting ads into browsers: http://www.pcworld.com/article/2976298/websites/att-wi-fi-hotspot-caught-injecting-ads-into-web-pages.html
appList.short_desc: FreeShield protects you from network attacks and invasive apps. Easy and Free.

appList.title: Manga Browser - Manga Reader
appList.description:
Manga Browser - Manga Reader help you read manga or comic on your android devices. 
Optimized user interface, Very easy to use! What you need to do is select and read. Features:
- Search manga with a key word.
- Browser manga on local disk, top list, hottest list, updated list etc.
- Image zoom control.
- Fling on images.
- Lock Image in partrait or landscape mode.
- Format support: png, jpeg, bmp, gif,
appList.short_desc: Manga Reader for android devices. Reading manga on your cellphone

appList.title: Crunchyroll Manga
appList.description:
Crunchyroll, the leader in streaming Anime and Asian content, is set to emerge as the digitally distribution Manga leader, starting with it's brand new mobile app! The Crunchyroll Manga app provides users with unlimited access to a variety of the hottest manga emerging from Japan! As soon as it hits newsstands in Japan, Crunchyroll Manga users can read the latest from hit titles like Attack on Titan, Fairy Tail, and Space Brothers. 

Premium users will be able to:

* Access the latest manga as it becomes available in Japan!
* Full mobile support (iOS and Android), including 'Koma-View,' which allows maximum scale per panel. 
* View the entire series catalog anytime, anywhere.
* Unlimited reading access.

This will be any Manga enthusiasts' one-stop-shop for all their Manga needs.
So what are you waiting for? Take advantage of the free trial today: 

Still have questions? Then check out our tutorial showcasing the full manga viewing experience: 


Check back with us for the latest updates and additions, here:
www.crunchyroll.com/manga
www.facebook.com/crunchyroll
www.twitter.com/crunchyroll
appList.short_desc: Manga at your fingertips! Enjoy latest manga updated every week!
appList.what_is_new:
2.0.6
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
2.0.5

appList.title: Comics
appList.description:
ComiXology is Amazon’s premier digital comics experience. Get swept away in the most immersive comic book, graphic novel & manga reading experience available on your phone or tablet. Access your comiXology library and start reading. Just download and get ready to take comics further. You can even use your Amazon account to sign in! For Marvel fanatics, DC devotees, comic newbies and manga maniacs, comiXology offers you instant access to more than 75,000 digital comics, graphic novels & manga. Whether you’re hooked on caped crusaders, zombie slayers or inter-galactic love affairs, with comiXology you’ll experience and enjoy comics like never before!

- Buy in-app and read all your comiXology comics, graphic novels & manga.
- Read many of your Kindle comics, graphic novels & manga purchases
- Use your Amazon account to sign in!
- Dig into your library using Smart Lists and enhanced My Books sorting options.
- Experience cinematic, immersive reading with Guided View technology and a reader that lets you easily scan, zoom and flip pages. 
- Same day as print releases.
- Digital first titles you won’t get anywhere else.
- A massive collection of foreign language comics and classics.
- Search for and add books to your Wish List.
- Read your comiXology purchases on all your devices.
- Enjoy our cloud-based platform with automatic sync across all of your devices.

ComiXology’s 75,000+ strong comics, graphic novel & manga library includes:
- Marvel Comics: The Avengers, Ms. Marvel, Daredevil, Ant-Man, Iron Man, Spider-Man, Dr. Strange, Black Widow, Jessica Jones: Alias, Deadpool, Captain America, The Hulk, The Fantastic Four, Thor, Wolverine, and more…
- DC Comics: Batman, Flash, Justice League, Superman, Harley Quinn, Arrow, Green Lantern, Smallville, The Dark Knight, Watchmen, V for Vendetta, Sandman, and more…
- Image Comics: The Walking Dead, Saga, Bitch Planet, Black Science, Spawn, and more…
- Dark Horse Comics: Hellboy, Usagi Yojimbo, Fear Agent, Aliens, Lone Wolf and Cub, and more… 
- IDW: Star Trek, Judge Dredd, G.I. Joe, Transformers, Bloom County, My Little Pony, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and more…
- Disney: Mickey Mouse, Cars, Toy Story, Donald Duck, Uncle Scrooge, Finding Nemo, The Lion King, Monsters, Inc., Tron, and more…
- Manga: Attack on Titan, Naruto, Bleach, All You Need is Kill, One Piece, Dragon Ball, One-Punch Man, and more…
- Don’t miss over five thousand great self-published titles coming out of comiXology Submit: Fresh Romance, Wolves, Leaving Megalopolis, Doc Unknown, Action Bible, Silver, Lady Mechanika, Revenger, and more…

You’ll also find titles like Dilbert, Doonesbury, Red Sonja, The Green Hornet, Vampirella, Adventure Time, Diary of a Wimpy Kid, Atomic Robo, and (you guessed it) many more!

"ComiXology is changing how comics are read." – TIME Magazine
"Solves the problem of reading comics on the small screen." – Wired Magazine
"Best comic reader in the world!” – Our favorite (uncompensated) fan

FIND US

-------------------------------
Web: comixology.com
Twitter: @comixology 
Tumblr: http://comixology.tumblr.com
Facebook: facebook.com/comixology
appList.short_desc: The only comics store and reader with Marvel Comics and DC Comics on Android!
appList.what_is_new:
* Corrected an issue where upgrading from a previous version of the app could cause the new app to crash.
* Few other bug squashes, too.

appList.title: YoMomma Jokes 1000+
appList.description:
Over 1200 classic and new 'Yo Momma' Jokes. Also to give Yo Momma' a break I thought I have included some of the same kind of jokes about other people in yo life. Never again run out of an opportunity to insult your enemy's(friend's?) mothers. Guaranteed laughs every time with these very funny jokes.

*Think you’re funnier; then submit your own jokes for inclusion in the app and get the credit too.

*Warning, these jokes contain swearing and topics of an adult nature and as such are intended only for grown ups. Please do not download if you easily offend you will only get upset*

*New jokes added weekly
*Submit your own joke for inclusion in the app. 
*Move to SD card (android 2.2+ only.)
*This app will remember were you are up to even if you turn off your phone or update the app
*Share with SMS/Email
*Add your own stories
*Random joke button
*Hold the left arrow to go back to the start
*Hold the right arrow to go to the end
*Link to developer’s other apps in the market
*Change the size of the text
*Change the color of the text
*Change the style of the text
*Change the background
*Rate the app

Examples of what's inside (jokes are not censored in the app):

"Yo Momma so fat she saw a school bus go by and yelled " TWINKIE!""

"Yo Momma So Ugly, I heard yer Father first met her at the Zoo."

"Yo Sister's so stupid she could trip over a cordless telephone."

"Yo Dog's so stupid he bury's his own tail"

"Yo Momma so fat, she sells shade in the summer."

N.B. Permissions are required by the Ad networks, which keep the app free.

The funnies Yo Momma Jokes ever, carefully collected for your fun. Fat momma, ugly mama jokes, pore momma, Yo momma so dumb, only the best yo momma jokes.

Bookmark your favorite jokes,
Send joke sms (text message)
Send funny joke email.

Yo mama jokes are a special type of one-liner jokes that mostly begin with ’Yo Mama’s so...’
It is derived from the insulting of one’s mother (or a suitable alternate relative) in an American accent.
The initial, Yo Mama (Your mother) can be combined with most types of insults which are suggestive of stupid or foolish behavior : Your momma’s so poor she can’t even pay attention!

Read the best jokes joke, it jokes funny quotes, funny joke, funnyjokes, humor jokes yo mama is, yo mamma sms jokes to mamma jokes, how to be funny, pranks, best humorous jokes, dirty jokes, funny quotes and sayings.

Tags: humorous quotes, funny dirty quotes, best yo momma jokes
appList.short_desc: Over 1200 classic and new 'Yo Momma' Jokes.

appList.title: The Avengers-Iron Man Mark VII
appList.description:
Set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, "Marvel's The Avengers: Iron Man - Mark VII" is an epic interactive comic book experience through the design logs of super hero Tony Stark as he journeys from his Mark I armor, used to escape from captivity in the Ten Rings insurgents' cave, to the high-powered Mark VI armor, used to vanquish Ivan Vanko and his army of Hammer Drones. A war has started and we are hopelessly outgunned. It is time for billionaire philanthropist Tony Stark to upgrade his Iron Man armor for the upcoming battle when "Marvel's The Avengers" assemble for the blockbuster movie event of summer 2012. 

Immerse yourself in the genius, grit and humor of Stark and team up with all your favorite Iron Man characters, including Pepper Potts, J.A.R.V.I.S., and James Rhodes, as Stark finds inspiration for his latest innovation, the Mark VII. 

Suit up, blast off, and hang on tight for the first-ever fully-interactive Comic Book App Experience! 

Features: 
- 15+ pages of an all-new story by fan fave creators, writer Fred Van Lente and artist Steve Kurth! Plus an all-new cover by the legendary Adi Granov! 
- Hit musical soundtrack from the Iron Man and Iron Man II movies! 
- Innovative new sliding panel navigation to immerse you in comics like never before! 
- Dozens of interactions that react to tilt, touch, and drag to give you full control over the experience! 
- "Read to Me" mode with word highlighting! 
- "Read Myself" mode with touchable words!
appList.short_desc: Suit up and Blast off in the First-Ever Fully-Interactive Comic Book Experience!
appList.what_is_new:
Find the security token on each page to unlock highly confidential files (pencil sketches) at the end of the book!
Other Updates:
- Bug fixes & Optimizations
- Unlockable pencil sketches Illustrated by Steve Kurth

appList.title: Draw Cartoons 2
appList.description:
Discover one of the most exciting and fun ways to express yourself through art. The complicated process of producing cartoons just became an easy task. The app takes care of every aspect of creating cartoons, from drawing characters to publishing. Enjoy the new characters constructor and new design

List of features
* Building smooth animations by keyframes. No more flipbook-style (well, you can if you want)
* Embedded library of characters and items
* Character constructor (you can create items from scratch or using templates)
* Voice over cartoons or add music
* Export and video files (mp4 format) and sharing them


Some features need to be unlocked through in-app purchases.
appList.short_desc: Producing cartoons just became an easy task. Learn how to draw and animate!
appList.what_is_new:
* a lot of new items in the Community pack
* editing and sharing backgrounds
* tutorial on how to create items
* fixed some crashes

appList.title: Pokedex Mega
appList.description:
The Pokédex app has a wealth of information on all the Poké creatures from the entire game series. On the main page you can see the various stats of each Poké. Touch a Poké's name to see a detailed page with Pokédex data, descriptions from previous games, sprites, evolutions, moves and more!

Features;

* 778 Pokémon
* 625 Moves
* 248 Abilities
* 20 Types
* 15 Egg groups
* 6609 Descriptions
* 719 Sprites
* 25 Games

Disclaimer:

This is an unofficial Pokedex. We are not affiliated or related to Pokemon company.
appList.short_desc: Finally all the Poké data you'll ever need, in one place!
appList.what_is_new:
- Mega Pokemon list added
- Special Attack and Special Defence information added
- Pokedex Id added
- Pokemon Types added
- Performance improvements
